content.rendered:
Vmaxinfo Instituteintroduce Robotics Summer Camp in punefor summer vacation in year 2019. Our robotics summer camp is learn experimental training with fun and explore students with technology. Children with our camp get knowledge about mechanics, electronics Assembly, Design, Program and circuit related to robotics. This is one of the best program for students to explore their skill in summer vacation. Following are details of course contents according to different age group. Contact for details Ph. No. 02532582186 or Mob No. 7030314949

Level 1Age Group 6 to 10 Years

  • Introduction to Robotics
  • Mechanics & Assembly
  • Battery Connections
  • Gears and Gear Trains
  • Fundamentals of Electronics
  • Simple circuit experiments
  • LED Projects
  • Lamp Project
  • Darkness control lamp
  • Robot Chassis Designing
  • Obstacle avoiding robot
  • Line following robot

Level 2Age Group 10 to 16 years

  • Introduction to Robotics
  • Mechanics & Assembly
  • Gears and Gear Trains
  • Fundamentals Electronic Circuit
  • Bread-boarding techniques
  • Circuit building and simulation
  • Use of semiconductors like
  • Diodes, Resistor, Capacitor, IC’s etc.
  • Learn to use sensors
  • Sensor based robots

Contact for details and admission.

Vmaxinfo Institute103, Sanmitra Apartment, First Floor,
Opp. HPT College Post Office, College Road,
Kulkarnu Baug Lane 4, Pune-5
Ph. 02532582186
